channel.title: Gaumont on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Gaumont on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Gaumont Marks 130 Years With Academy Museum Retrospective
item.description: Classics from Gaumont’s library, including Godard’s ‘Weekend’ (1967) and Carl Theodor Dreyer’s ‘The Passion of Joan of Arc’ (1928), will be screened at the Los Angeles retrospective.

item.title: Gaumont Marks 130 Years With Academy Museum Retrospective
item.description: Classics from Gaumont’s library, including Godard’s ‘Weekend’ (1967) and Carl Theodor Dreyer’s ‘The Passion of Joan of Arc’ (1928), will be screened at the Los Angeles retrospective.

item.title: French President Emmanuel Macron and Wife Brigitte File Defamation Lawsuit Against Candace Owens
item.description: French President Emmanuel Macron and Brigitte Macron have filed a defamation lawsuit against Candace Owens, the conservative influencer and podcaster who claims the first lady was born male. Filed in
